subject: Horse Racing
Kentucky Derby
lead_paragraph: The undefeated Verrazano was expected by many to be the morning-line favorite. But after a blazing workout, Orb ran away with that honor when the field was drawn.
snippet: The undefeated Verrazano was expected by many to be the morning-line favorite. But after a blazing workout, Orb ran away with that honor when the field was drawn.
